verses.verse: There was a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H347>Job<s%>; and that <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H8535>perfect<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%>, and one that <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5493>eschewed<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
And there were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

His <S%H4735>substance<s%> also was <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> she <S%H860>asses<s%>, and a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5657>household<s%>; so that this <S%H376>man<s%> was the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> of all the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>.

And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H4960%H6213>feasted<s%> in their <S%H1004>houses<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H3117>day<s%>; and <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H269>sisters<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink<s%> with them.

And it was so, when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of their <S%H4960>feasting<s%> were gone <S%H5362>about<s%>, that <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them, and rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them all: for <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, It may <S%H194>be<s%> that my <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and <S%H1288>cursed<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%>. Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3117>continually<s%>.

¶ Now there was a <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3320>present<s%> themselves before the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, <S%H370>Whence<s%> <S%H935>comest<s%> thou? Then <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, From going to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and from walking up and <S%H1980>down<s%> in it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, Hast thou <S%H7760%H3820>considered<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>, that there is none like him in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, a <S%H8535>perfect<s%> and an <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, one that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5493>escheweth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>?
Then <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Doth <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H2600>nought<s%>?

Hast not thou made an <S%H7753>hedge<s%> about him, and <S%H1157>about<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and about all that he hath on every <S%H5439>side<s%>? thou hast <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and his <S%H4735>substance<s%> is <S%H6555>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
<S%H199>But<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> now, and <S%H5060>touch<s%> all that he hath, and he will <S%H1288%H3808>curse<s%> thee to thy <S%H6440>face<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, Behold, all that he hath is in thy <S%H3027>power<s%>; only upon himself put not <S%H7971>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>. So <S%H7854>Satan<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ And there was a <S%H3117>day<s%> when his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>:

And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> unto <S%H347>Job<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1241>oxen<s%> were <S%H2790>plowing<s%>, and the <S%H860>asses<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> them:

And the <S%H7614>Sabeans<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon them, and took them <S%H3947>away<s%>; yea, they have <S%H5221>slain<s%> the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also another, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and hath burned <S%H1197>up<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and the <S%H5288>servants<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> them; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also another, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> made <S%H7760>out<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>bands<s%>, and <S%H6584>fell<s%> upon the <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and have carried them <S%H3947>away<s%>, yea, and <S%H5221>slain<s%> the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also another, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>:

And, behold, there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5676>from<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H5060>smote<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and it <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon the young <S%H5288>men<s%>, and they are <S%H4191>dead<s%>; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H4598>mantle<s%>, and <S%H1494>shaved<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6174>Naked<s%> came I <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H990>womb<s%>, and <S%H6174>naked<s%> shall I <S%H7725>return<s%> thither: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath taken <S%H3947>away<s%>; <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
In all this <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H2398>sinned<s%> not, nor <S%H5414>charged<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8604>foolishly<s%>.
